content: Hi，I am Yu LI. I work at Shanghai Advanced Institute of Finance, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. My primary research area is asset pricing. My research interest includes consumption price and climate risk. In addition, I aim to deliver sincere support for students pursuing excellence and impact.
